hero.title: Handcrafted Tags & Collars
hero.description: Discover beautifully designed pet accessories that blend timeless style with modern tech — making sure your furry friend is always just a scan away.

printerSection.description1: Each tag is 3D-printed in-house using high-quality, eco-conscious materials. Our process ensures durable, lightweight designs that withstand daily adventures — while giving every pet a touch of personal style.
printerSection.description2: What looks like a simple tag holds powerful features. Embedded NFC chips link to a digital profile, helping reunite lost pets with their owners faster — no apps, no batteries, just a simple scan.

products.title: Loved by Pets. Trusted by Humans.
products.title_secondary: Explore our handcrafted collars and NFC pet tags — built to last, easy to use, and ready for any adventure.

testimonial.title: I was amazed when someone scanned my dog's tag and I got an SMS instantly. The quality is stunning and the idea is just genius. Thank you, Pawsitive!

about.title: The Idea Behind Pawsitive
about.about_description:
We were tired of boring metal tags that fade and scratch.
So we built something better — handcrafted collars with built-in NFC tags that actually work when it matters.

No batteries. No charging.
Just a tap, and your pet’s profile shows up instantly.
about.block_1: Our products are handmade using durable materials like PETG and paracord — each one is as unique as your pet.
about.block_2: Our secure NFC tag links to a digital profile. You decide what info to show when someone scans it.
about.block_3: Get notified via SMS and email the moment your pet's tag is scanned by someone — no app, no setup needed.
about.about_heading: Why we do what we do

features.title: What Makes Pawsitive Special
features.title_secondary: We combine premium materials, smart technology, and handmade design into one beautiful solution.
features.reason1_text: Every collar and tag is carefully handmade — strong, stylish, and one of a kind.
features.reason2_text:
Our smart tags store a secure link to your pet’s profile.
Just tap with a phone — no app needed.
features.reason3_text: The NFC chip is sealed inside — completely weatherproof and always ready.

services.title: What We Offer
services.title_secondary: From lost pet assistance to premium product customization — we’ve got your pet covered.
services.reason1_text: Choose from a variety of styles and personalize your tag to match your pet’s personality.
services.reason2_text: Get SMS and email notifications the moment someone scans your lost pet’s tag.
services.reason3_text: Each item is handmade with attention to detail, comfort, and durability.

reasoning.title: Why Pet Owners Trust Pawsitive
reasoning.title_secondary: More than just a tag — Pawsitive means safety, style, and support in one.

footer.paragraph: Stay updated with Pawsitive – new designs, restocks, and happy tail stories.

about.label: About Pawsitive
about.paragraph:
At Pawsitive Collar, we believe that pets are more than just companions — they are family, confidants, and lifelong friends.

Our journey began with a simple idea: to create thoughtful products that strengthen the bond between humans and their pets. We aim to combine hands-on craftsmanship with smart technology to offer not just accessories, but peace of mind.

Every piece we make reflects our love — love for animals, for design, and for the people who care deeply for their pets. We believe that a pet’s collar should tell a story: one of care, responsibility, and connection.

From daily adventures to quiet moments at home, our collars and tags are built to be with you and your pet — functional, beautiful, and built to last.

history.label: Our History
history.paragraph:
Pawsitive Collar was founded in 2024 by two passionate pet lovers who were frustrated by the lack of practical and thoughtfully designed pet accessories. Many existing products felt mass-produced, generic, or lacked real innovation.

So, we decided to build something better — from scratch.

What began as sketches and prototypes quickly turned into a full project combining 3D modeling, printing, and web technologies. We taught ourselves everything from CAD design to embedded NFC workflows, driven by one question: what would we want for our own pets?

Every step of our journey has been shaped by direct feedback from fellow pet owners. Their support, ideas, and stories are what inspire us to keep improving.

sustainability.label: Sustainability
sustainability.paragraph:
We care deeply about the future — not just of pets, but of the planet they roam.

Our workshop runs entirely on certified green energy. We use durable materials like PETG and high-quality paracord to produce long-lasting products that reduce waste over time. Our 3D printing process is optimized to minimize excess and reuses leftover materials wherever possible.

We don’t mass-produce. We don’t chase trends. Every item is made with intention — created one at a time, for pets who mean the world to their humans.

While we may be small, we’re committed to growing responsibly and making sustainability a core part of everything we do.

team.label: Our Team
team.paragraph:
We are a two-person team — partners in life and in purpose — who share a deep love for animals, design, and DIY creation.

Together, we handle everything from product development and NFC integration to hand-braiding paracord collars and running the online shop. It’s not a big operation — just two passionate pet parents working evenings and weekends to build something meaningful.

We know what it feels like to lose a pet and what a relief it is to find them again. That’s why our mission isn’t just to make beautiful collars, but to offer smart, reliable tools that help keep pets safe.

It’s about building a brand and community that values pets as much as we do.

hero.title: We’re here for you.
hero.description: Got a question about our products or need a hand with something? Just drop us a message — we’re always happy to help and love hearing from fellow pet lovers.
hero.follow: Follow us on social media for behind-the-scenes updates, helpful tips, and news about our latest creations.
